CodeEditorModel.Text:
Sub myMovie
'Movie in Loop (Main Page) If _HMI_CurrentPage = "Main" Then Screen_Name = Screen_Origin accum = accum+1 If accum >142 And accum <143 Then StopMovie("Main", "MediaPlayer0") PlayMovie("Main", "MediaPlayer0") End If If accum >143 PlayMovie("Main", "MediaPlayer0") accum=0 End If Else accum = 0 End If
End Sub
Sub myGears
'Movie in Loop (Gears Page) If _HMI_CurrentPage = "Gears" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "Gears" accumGear = accumGear+1 If accumGear >54 And accumGear <56 Then StopMovie("Gears", "MediaPlayer0") PlayMovie("Gears", "MediaPlayer0") End If If accumGear >56 PlayMovie("Gears", "MediaPlayer0") accumGear=0 End If Else accumGear = 0 End If
End Sub
Sub myCAM
'Movie in Loop (CAM Page) If _HMI_CurrentPage = "CAM" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "CAM" accumCAM = accumCAM+1 If accumCAM >54 And accumCAM <56 Then StopMovie("CAM", "MediaPlayer0") PlayMovie("CAM", "MediaPlayer0") End If If accumCAM >56 PlayMovie("CAM", "MediaPlayer0") accumCAM=0 End If Else accumCAM = 0 End If
End Sub
Sub myPhasing
'Movie in Loop (Phasing Page) If _HMI_CurrentPage = "Phasing" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "Phasing" accumPhasing = accumPhasing+1 If accumPhasing >54 And accumPhasing <56 Then StopMovie("Phasing", "MediaPlayer0") PlayMovie("Phasing", "MediaPlayer0") End If If accumPhasing >56 PlayMovie("Phasing", "MediaPlayer0") accumPhasing=0 End If Else accumPhasing = 0 End If
End Sub
Sub myRotary
'Movie in Loop (RKPage) If (_HMI_CurrentPage = "RotaryKnife") Or ( _HMI_CurrentPage = "RK_Pop" ) Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "RotaryKnife" accumRK = accumRK+1 If accumRK >22 And accumRK <24 Then StopMovie("RotaryKnife", "MediaPlayer0") PlayMovie("RotaryKnife", "MediaPlayer0") End If If accumRK >24 PlayMovie("RotaryKnife", "MediaPlayer0") accumRK=0 End If Else accumRK = 0 End If
End Sub
Sub myFlying
'Movie in Loop (FSPage) If (_HMI_CurrentPage = "FlyingShear") Or ( _HMI_CurrentPage = "FS_Pop" )Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "FlyingShear" accumFS = accumFS+1 If accumFS >8 And accumFS <10 Then StopMovie("FlyingShear", "MediaPlayer0") PlayMovie("FlyingShear", "MediaPlayer0") End If If accumFS >10 PlayMovie("FlyingShear", "MediaPlayer0") accumFS=0 End If Else accumFS = 0 End If
End Sub
'F2 routine to go back to the same page Sub myF2 If Aux = 1 Showpage(Screen_Name) Aux = 0 End If
If _HMI_CurrentPage = "PackML" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "PackML" End If If _HMI_CurrentPage = "CombineAxes" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "CombineAxes" End If If _HMI_CurrentPage = "MainIOLink" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "MainIOLink" End If If _HMI_CurrentPage = "INFO" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "INFO" End If If _HMI_CurrentPage = "TroubleShooter" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "TroubleShooter" End If If _HMI_CurrentPage = "Wiring_IO_Check" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "Wiring_IO_Check" End If
If _HMI_CurrentPage = "OEE" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "OEE" End If
If _HMI_CurrentPage = "Alarms_History" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "Alarms_History" End If
If _HMI_CurrentPage = "SystemMonitor" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "SystemMonitor" End If
If _HMI_CurrentPage = "DisturbanceSim" Then Screen_Name = "Main" Screen_Origin = "DisturbanceSim" End If
End Sub
